definition: to put in an important position
heavy/serious/to attach importance to
to repeat/repetition/again/re-/classifier: layer
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Consult your legal counsel if you have any doubts about reusing content.
sentences.chinese: 若對重用內容有任何疑問，請諮詢您的法律顧問。

sentences.english: Is there a body that looks at cross-functional application reusability?
sentences.chinese: 是否有團體在考慮跨功能應用程序的可重用性？

sentences.english: You can create reusable custom components by extending this class.
sentences.chinese: 通過擴展此類可以創建可重用的定製組件。

sentences.english: In fact, Conway reused Carroll's method as part of the doomsday algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，康威在他的末日算法中重用了卡羅爾的方法。

sentences.english: Service reuse discussions can be cast in the context of process overlaps.
sentences.chinese: 服務重用可以被放在流程重疊的上下文中去討論。

sentences.english: A reusing process must therefore be able to handle any of the possible outputs.
sentences.chinese: 因此一個重用流程必須有能力處理任何可能的輸出。

sentences.english: Then you can quickly retrieve items from your pasteboard to reuse.
sentences.chinese: 然後，你就可以迅速檢索項目從您的紙板重用。

sentences.english: Erich Gamma : We call this black box reuse.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以把這稱作是“黑盒重用”。

sentences.english: The thousands of scripts and programs available for reuse on Hotscripts.com are proof of that.
sentences.chinese: 上成千上萬可供重用的腳本和程序就是很好的證明。

sentences.english: It's a good idea to reuse or create your own stereotypes and profiles.
sentences.chinese: 重用或重新創建模版及配置文件都是個很好的主意。

sentences.english: This granularity lets processes leverage and reuse each sub-application throughout the organization.
sentences.chinese: 這種粒度允許利用和重用整個組織中的子應用程序。

sentences.english: Almost all the code in this article is reusable.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎本文的所有代碼都是可重用的。

sentences.english: A small crane for rail replacement at Hua-Lien Station.
sentences.chinese: 花蓮站內的鋼軌起重用鐵擔車。

sentences.english: Retrieval of information is the base of information search, information sharing and reuse.
sentences.chinese: 信息提取技術是信息檢索和信息共享與重用的基礎。

sentences.english: The idea is that software should be developed such that it can be constructed from re-usable parts.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說軟件應該由可重用的部件構造而成。

sentences.english: Intents add a layer of indirection that enables sophisticated component reuse and substitution.
sentences.chinese: 目的添加了一個間接層來支持複雜組件的重用和替換。

definition: to regard sth as valuable/to think highly of (a younger person, a subordinate etc)
to promote to a higher job/to select for promotion
to appreciate/to recognize the worth of sth/appreciation
to appoint/to assign
to recommend
to dote on and trust
to rely heavily upon
to assist (usually a ruler)
select the best people for promotion
to appoint people by favoritism (idiom); nepotism/corrupt appointment
expert at appointing people according to their abilities (idiom)/to put the right people in the right places
to promote/to reinstate (in a position or job)
to dismiss from office/to ban/to reject
trusted lieutenant
to hold power
a general or admiral
